headline: How State Street’s New MENA HQ and Alternatives Push at STT Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: State Street Corporation announced the official launch of its Middle East and North Africa Regional Headquarters in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, after receiving approval from the Ministry of Investment Saudi Arabia, further solidifying its over 25-year presence in the region. This expansion, combined with a new minority investment in Coller Capital, a specialist in alternative investments, signals the company’s intent to boost its regional influence and strengthen its position in the fast-growing...
